description:
Haruka`s mother. She is often spaced out;
for example, late in the series, she doesn`t realise her daughter has disappeared until her whole house vanishes. She was once best friends with Yuu`s mother, but their friendship eventually started to fall apart when Yuu`s grandmother died; after Haruka and Miyuki visit the past, Asuka and Miyuki re-affirm their friendship.
name: Kaminogi Asuka
